title: Seeds of discovery
creator_credit: Bert Lawrence, National Aeronautics and Space Administration and MRC Films
brief_description: An introduction to planetary exploration and scientific satellite research considered for the 1970’s. Briefly describes plans for Mariner flybys of Mars, Pioneer studies of Jupiter, landings of unmanned Viking spacecraft on Mars, a grand tour of the outer planets, and solar and other astronomy research.
